Form Masks

Input Masks

A jQuery Plugin to make masks on form fields and HTML elements.

e.g "DD/MM/YYYY"
e.g "HH:MM:SS"
e.g "DD/MM/YYYY HH:MM:SS"
e.g "xxxxx-xxx"
e.g "x-xx-xx-xx"
e.g "Your money"
e.g "#.##0,00"
e.g "xxxx-xxxx"
e.g "(xx) xxxx-xxxx"
e.g "(xxx) xxx-xxxx"
e.g "(xx) xxxxx-xxxx"
e.g "xxx.xxx.xxxx-xx"
e.g "xx.xxx.xxx/xxxx-xx"
e.g "xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx"

Auto Numberic

A jQuery Plugin to make masks on form fields and HTML elements.

e.g. "1.234.567.890.123"
e.g. "$ $ 1,234,567,890,123"
e.g. "€ 1,234,567,890,123"
e.g. "Rs. 1,234,567,890,123"
e.g. "¥ 1,2345,6789,0123"
e.g. "£ 1,234,567,890,123"
e.g. "11%"
e.g. "9,999"
e.g. "1000 Or -99.99"
e.g. "(9,999.00)"
